title: Love Lost And Found
description: Love Lost and Found is a series of poems centred around three themes; losing love, finding love and love that has expired, such as living through divorce and co-parenting. The title Love Lost and Found is referencing a poem that Eryn wrote when they were 16 and this series of poems is their attempt at answering the questions posed within the poem.There are poems about romantic love and breakups but there are also poems about family, friends, children and even the Cat. Because love comes in all forms.There are some darker themes in this collection including poetry about grief, emotional abuse and childhood trauma that might be difficult for some readers.
author: E.M. McConnell
